page.title: 18LIFE FOR A CHILD IN SHAW 2
page.content:
When we get to school we talk or play in the playground until it is time to go into school.We usually have assembly first and afterwards we do some maths or English.At 10.40am we have first play.Then at 12.00am we have another playtime until the dinner lady calls us in for dinner.After dinner we do some work.
At 3.30pm it is hometime.I walk up the hill with Kay.Then I unlock the front door and let the cat out.I usually watch TV for 2 hours.At 6.00pm I have my tea.Then I play out.I go to bed at 9.00pm.
